title: The Regent's Burden
description: You have declared support for Regent Borin and the crowning of the infant prince. The traditionalist faction is grateful, but Thane Grimjaw and his Rite-Seekers refuse to accept this outcome without proper ceremony. Borin asks you to recover the Crown of the Mountain Kings from the treasury - now looted by goblins - to legitimize the coronation.

objectives.description: Search the looted treasury in the Deep Vaults for the Crown
Recover the Crown of the Mountain Kings
Return the Crown to Regent Borin

faction_outcome.result: The infant prince is crowned with Borin as regent. The bloodline continues, and stability returns to Kazan-Dun - though some whisper that Grimjaw plots from the shadows.
